Summary: This document outlines the timetable for the MTech EBAC course for the August 2024 intake, with classes scheduled from 9:00am to 5:30pm on Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays. The course will cover topics such as analytics project management, statistics for business, data management, and data storytelling. The course manager is Charles, and the dates for the first semester are from August to November 2024. This information is confidential and was last updated on March 19th, 2025.

The document provides a timetable for the EBA5002 Graduate Certificate in Business Analytics Practice course for the academic year 2024/2025. The course will be managed by Maowen, Wangdong, and Zhenzhen. The course will run from September 16, 2024 to October 10, 2024, with classes held from 9:00am to 5:00pm on Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays. The schedule includes topics such as Data Analytics Process and Best Practice II, Predictive Analytics, and Text Analytics. The timetable is confidential and was last updated on March 19, 2025.

The AY2024/2025 Semester 1 exam timetable includes exams for various graduate certificate courses such as Analytics Project Management, Intelligent Reasoning Systems, and Architecting Scalable Systems. The exams will take place on November 4th, 5th, 6th, and 7th from 6:30pm to 10:00pm. The timetable is subject to change in case of unforeseen circumstances. The MTech EBAC timetable is confidential and was last updated on March 19th, 2025.
